title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, cured pork (guanciale or pancetta), and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the guanciale in a frying pan until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside.
In a bowl, mix the eggs, grated Pecorino Romano, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Cook the spaghetti according to package directions. Reserve some pasta water.
Drain the spaghetti, add it to the pan with the guanciale fat (off the heat).
Quickly pour in the egg mixture and stir vigorously, adding reserved pasta water until a creamy sauce forms. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, half of the Tikka Masala paste, and ginger-garlic paste for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through (this is the 'tikka' step).
Sauté the remaining Tikka Masala paste, add crushed tomatoes, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in the cooked chicken and heavy cream. Simmer gently until heated through. Serve with rice.

title: Vegan Lentil Soup
summary: A hearty, nutritious, and easy-to-make soup with brown lentils, vegetables, and aromatic spices.
instructions: Sauté the onion, carrot, and celery in a large pot until softened.
Stir in the cumin, lentils, and vegetable broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-40 minutes, or until lentils are tender. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Classic Pancakes
summary: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes perfect for breakfast, topped with syrup and fresh berries.
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the dry ingredients (flour, baking powder, salt, sugar).
In a separate bowl, mix the wet ingredients (milk, egg, melted butter).
Pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture and stir until just combined (don't overmix).
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto a lightly oiled griddle set to medium heat. Cook until bubbles appear on the surface. Flip and cook until browned.
